subject: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
body:
[image:
http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/telegraph/multimedia/archive/01154/scotland_yard_1154669c.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/politics/lawandorder/4838955/Black-Met-officers-claimed-they-were-subjected-to-monkey-taunts.html&usg=__JVvkFUUIweXfXz5WiJOSQeEyRKE=&h=288&w=460&sz=26&hl=en&start=1&sig2=4GXb8ugnzdDyyHJyguItww&tbnid=_EwJf6kGfdcg4M:&tbnh=80&tbnw=128&prev=/images?q=Scotland+yard+police+and+their+logo&gbv=2&hl=en&sa=G&ei=v7nISeShGITkyAX36unuAw]
<https://deref-mail.com/mail/client/bgm0UVE8l6M/dereferrer/?redirectUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fimages.google.com%2Fimgres%3Fimgurl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.telegraph.co.uk%2Ftelegraph%2Fmultimedia%2Farchive%2F01154%2Fscotland_yard_1154669c.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.telegraph.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fnewstopics%2Fpolitics%2Flawandorder%2F4838955%2FBlack-Met-officers-claimed-they-were-subjected-to-monkey-taunts.html%26usg%3D__JVvkFUUIweXfXz5WiJOSQeEyRKE%3D%26h%3D288%26w%3D460%26sz%3D26%26hl%3Den%26start%3D1%26sig2%3D4GXb8ugnzdDyyHJyguItww%26tbnid%3D_EwJf6kGfdcg4M%3A%26tbnh%3D80%26tbnw%3D128%26prev%3D%2Fimages%3Fq%253DScotland%252Byard%252Bpolice%252Band%252Btheir%252Blogo%2526gbv%253D2%2526hl%253Den%2526sa%253DG%26ei%3Dv7nISeShGITkyAX36unuAw>

RANDOLPH FIELD, STIRLING,
SCOTLAND, FK8 2HD
LONDON/UK




*SCOTLAND YARD POLICE SURVEILLANCE UNIT LONDON UK*
Attn: Ms. Gloria

We the Scotland Yard Police London UK/ wish to bring to your kind attention
that we will appreciate if you will find it worthy doing to provide answers
to the below question on what is going on between you and the Management of
Central Bank of Nigeria in regard to your package, have you be inform
by Inspection Agent Mrs Thelma Davis on how you are going to provide the
document in your name to enable them release your package  to you without
delay, Meanwhile , you are advise to only  follow the intrusion from Agent
Mrs Thelma Davis to enable her direct you on how best to get those
documents since she is in Nigeria.

We will appreciate your kind understanding and urgent response to my
message so that we can guide you on what is necessary to do because we care
so much and would like to be there for you to ensure this transaction goes
smoothly and according to your satisfaction.

Expecting your positive response.
Best Regard

*Sir Mark Peter Rowley*
Chairman, Central Scotland Police
Randolph field, Stirling,
Scotland, FK8 2HD

subject: Re: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your concern and guidance. Could you please provide more details about the package and the documents required by Mrs. Thelma Davis? I want to make sure everything is in order before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Gloria

subject: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
body:

http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/telegraph/multimedia/archive/01154/scotland_yard_1154669c.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/politics/lawandorder/4838955/Black-Met-officers-claimed-they-were-subjected-to-monkey-taunts.html&usg=__JVvkFUUIweXfXz5WiJOSQeEyRKE=&h=288&w=460&sz=26&hl=en&start=1&sig2=4GXb8ugnzdDyyHJyguItww&tbnid=_EwJf6kGfdcg4M:&tbnh=80&tbnw=128&prev=/images?q=Scotland+yard+police+and+their+logo&gbv=2&hl=en&sa=G&ei=v7nISeShGITkyAX36unuAw]
<https://deref-mail.com/mail/client/bgm0UVE8l6M/dereferrer/?redirectUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fimages.google.com%2Fimgres%3Fimgurl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.telegraph.co.uk%2Ftelegraph%2Fmultimedia%2Farchive%2F01154%2Fscotland_yard_1154669c.jpg%26imgrefurl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.telegraph.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fnewstopics%2Fpolitics%2Flawandorder%2F4838955%2FBlack-Met-officers-claimed-they-were-subjected-to-monkey-taunts.html%26usg%3D__JVvkFUUIweXfXz5WiJOSQeEyRKE%3D%26h%3D288%26w%3D460%26sz%3D26%26hl%3Den%26start%3D1%26sig2%3D4GXb8ugnzdDyyHJyguItww%26tbnid%3D_EwJf6kGfdcg4M%3A%26tbnh%3D80%26tbnw%3D128%26prev%3D%2Fimages%3Fq%253DScotland%252Byard%252Bpolice%252Band%252Btheir%252Blogo%2526gbv%253D2%2526hl%253Den%2526sa%253DG%26ei%3Dv7nISeShGITkyAX36unuAw>

RANDOLPH FIELD, STIRLING,
SCOTLAND, FK8 2HD
LONDON/UK




*SCOTLAND YARD POLICE SURVEILLANCE UNIT LONDON UK*
Attn: Ms. Gloria

We the Scotland Yard Police London UK/ wish to inform you we received your
email with the content therein noted, well the details of the fund it is an
inheritance fund of next of kin/contract payment which your email and your
name appear as one of the beneficiary to inherit the said fund, and the
United Nation have mapped out $1.3 Billion to off-set all the  foreign debt
that was Originated from Central Bank of Nigeria and other Bank in the
world.

However: you are on this noted advise to contact Ms.Thelma Davis the
Inspection Agent who was sent to Republic of Nigeria in Africa previously
to tackle this problem to enable the beneficiaries to obtain the Sworn
Affidavit for claim which will empower the United Nation to release your
package to you without any further delay as this is the only thing that is
going to hold your package,

Expecting your positive response.
Best Regard

*Sir Mark Peter Rowley*
Chairman, Central Scotland Police
Randolph field, Stirling,
Scotland, FK8 2HD

subject: Re: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
Re: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Gloria

subject: Re: Attention : Ms Gloria Central Scotland Police London/Uk
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you provide more details about the fund and how I can proceed to claim it?

Best wishes,
Gloria

RANDOLPH FIELD, STIRLING,
SCOTLAND, FK8 2HD
LONDON/UK




*SCOTLAND YARD POLICE SURVEILLANCE UNIT LONDON UK*
Attn: Ms. Gloria

We the Scotland Yard Police London UK/ wishes to bring your attention that
we received your email which the content hold my best interest, Well you
are advise to contact  Inspection Agent Mrs Thelma Davis with this email
she will be on the safe hand to guide you more on how to proceed with the
securing of the said documents on your name, *(thelmadavis010@gmail.com
<thelmadavis010@gmail.com>)*

Expecting your positive response.
Best Regard

*Sir Mark Peter Rowley*
Chairman, Central Scotland Police
Randolph field, Stirling,
Scotland, FK8 2HD

body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Could you tell me more about the documents that need to be secured in my name? What is the process involved in this?

Best wishes,
Gloria
